import React, { useState, useCallback, FC } from "react" import styles from "./popupTweet.module.css" import avatar from "../../images/png/Bitmap.png" import globe from "../../images/svg/popup/globe-alt.svg" import iconOne from "../../images/svg/popup/image.svg" import music from "../../images/svg/popup/music-speaker.svg" import align from "../../images/svg/popup/align-left.svg" import calendar from "../../images/svg/popup/calendar-two.svg" import coffee from "../../images/svg/popup/coffee.svg" type props = { SetPostNews: any setPopup: (prev) => boolean // onClickHandler?: (isOpen: boolean) => void } const PopupTweet: FC = ({ SetPostNews, setPopup }) => { const [value, setValue] = useState("") const onClick = useCallback(() => setPopup((prev: boolean) => !prev), [setPopup]) const ChangeEvent = useCallback((e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setValue(e.target.value) }, []) const onButtonClick = useCallback( (e: React.MouseEvent) => { if (value.length > 0) { SetPostNews((prev: any) => [{ value, isFlagLike: false, id: new Date() }, ...prev]) setValue("") onClick() } else { onClick() } }, [SetPostNews, value, onClick] ) return (

Отвечать могут все пользователи

) } export default PopupTweet
